timeline.message: orig graph changes from downstreammerge patch
add check to avoid tail-to-head connected plans
remove invalid ts -es from the list
some conditionals are removed by the improved push filter to ts method

timeline.bodyText: I see 2 new subtree reusals in this plan - which have resulted in the removal of 4 vertices
timeline.author: kgyrtkirk

timeline.bodyText:
this SJ filter became absent after HIVE-23939 (ts schema merge patch)
the merged TS operators were retained in the working list when the schema merge related logic was called - I have not digged deeper into this - taking a look at the input plan this SJ filter makes sense to me
timeline.author: kgyrtkirk
timeline.diffHunk:

                                               default@store_sales,store_sales,Tbl:COMPLETE,Col:COMPLETE,Output:["ss_sold_date_sk","ss_item_sk","ss_customer_sk","ss_store_sk","ss_promo_sk","ss_ext_sales_price"]
+                                            <-Reducer 18 [BROADCAST_EDGE] vectorized

replies.bodyText: Maybe it was because one TS was targeted by a SJ and the other one was not?
replies.author: jcamachor

replies.bodyText:
the interesting thing is that this plan has no scans without SJ -  I think during one of the merge steps the SJ filter was removed - and because older TS ops were not removed in a later step it merged with it...
but this patch fixes this bug for sure...so we are good :)
replies.author: kgyrtkirk

timeline.author: kgyrtkirk
